DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study analyze , randomize control trial , effect exercise-based cardiac rehabilitation program ( ) biomarkers endothelial function , ( ii ) biomarkers inflammation , ( iii ) autonomic function , ( iv ) arterial stiffness coronary artery disease patient ( CAD ) . Additionally , investigator aim analyze ( v ) contribution age change traditional risk factor modification endothelial dysfunction inflammation , ( vi ) contribution change inflammatory endothelial function biomarkers modification autonomic function arterial stiffness . Thus , investigator expect present study promote , develop expand knowledge field assess impact exercise pool marker provide wide picture pathophysiological process underlie CAD .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise Training Endothelial Function , Inflammation , Arterial Stiffness Autonomic Function CAD
DOC.criteria: acute myocardial infarction ventricular tachyarrhythmia uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 180 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg ) significant valvular disease unstable angina pectoris reduce leave ventricular function ( ejection fraction < 45 % ) abnormal hemodynamic response myocardial ischemia and/or severe ventricular arrhythmia baseline exercise testing uncontrolled metabolic disease ( e.g . uncontrolled diabetes thyroid disease ) presence pulmonary renal comorbidities peripheral artery disease and/or orthopedic limitation
